titleStmt.title: The expiation of a sinner in a commentary vpon the Epistle to the Hebrevves.
Commentarius in Epistolam ad Hebraeos. English
titleStmt.author: Crell, Johann, 1590-1633.
Lushington, Thomas, 1590-1661.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Harper, and are to be sold by Charles Greene ...,

notesStmt.note: Translated from the Latin, with some alterations and additions, by Thomas Lushington. cf. DNB.
Attributed to Johann Crell. cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
Entry cancelled for L3501A in Wing (2nd ed.).
Pages 226 and 231 have heavy print show through in filmed copy. Pages 220-245 photographed from University of Virgina copy and inserted at end.
